net.sf.saxon.regex

Class JTokenIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.saxon.regex.JTokenIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, SequenceIterator, AtomicIterator<StringValue>, UnfailingIterator

    public class JTokenIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements AtomicIterator<StringValue>
    A JTokenIterator is an iterator over the strings that result from tokenizing a string using a regular expression, in this case a regular expression evaluated using the JDK regex engine
